name: Skeleton Wander
description:
SOOOOO..... Technically this isn't a game.  It's interactive art.  My professor wanted us to make something as far away from a game as possible using Unity, a 3D game building software.  So the result was exploring a 3D world as a 3D skeleton.  Is this  full of glitches and not super-well made?  Oh, yes.  Have fun.  I may update it.

You would have been able to play it on the web, but I couldn't figure out  the build settings and what itch.io wanted from me. 

Controls: You point your mouse in the direction you want to move.  AWSD for moving.  Space bar to jump.  F to fly, click it again to stop flying.  You can't swim.  SHIFT to go faster.    That's all I've got.

To the wandering!!!
